task: Quantify numerical error in determinant evaluation for G({x_e})
python_snippet:
import numpy as np
from project.generating_functional import generate_K, compute_determinant
xs = np.linspace(-0.9, 0.9, 100)
errors = []
for x in xs:
    K = generate_K([x, x])  # example 6-j config
    det1 = compute_determinant(K)
    det2 = compute_determinant(K.astype(np.float64))
    errors.append(abs(det1 - det2))
assert max(errors) < 1e-10
